title: Add new vehicle driving log successfully
description: Verify that a user can add a new vehicle driving log with valid inputs, and the log is saved and displayed correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the vehicle driving logs interface
Click on 'Add new log' button
Fill in all required fields with valid data (date, vehicle, driver, start/end location, mileage)
Submit the form
Verify the new driving log appears in the list with correct details
Confirm data is persisted by refreshing the page and checking the log still exists

title: Edit an existing vehicle driving log
description: Verify that the user can edit an existing vehicle driving log and changes are saved correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the vehicle driving logs list
Select an existing log and click 'Edit'
Modify fields such as mileage and notes
Submit the changes
Verify the updated data is reflected in the driving logs list
Reload the page and verify that the changes persist

title: Delete a vehicle driving log
description: Ensure that a user can delete a driving log and it is removed from the list and database.

steps.description: Navigate to the vehicle driving logs
Select a driving log and click 'Delete'
Confirm the deletion action
Verify the driving log is removed from the list
Reload page and verify the log does not reappear

title: Filter driving logs by date range and vehicle
description: Verify filtering driving logs by various criteria (date range, vehicle) returns correct subset of logs.

steps.description: Navigate to the driving logs interface
Set date range filter
Set vehicle filter
Apply filters
Verify only the driving logs matching the filters appear

title: Export driving logs to CSV with UTF-8 BOM
description: Validate CSV export of driving logs includes UTF-8 BOM in the file header for compatibility.

steps.description: Navigate to the driving logs page with some logs available
Click on the 'Export to CSV' button
Verify the downloaded CSV file is decoded properly in UTF-8 and contains BOM characters
Check CSV content matches the currently displayed logs

title: Create vehicle reservation with no conflicts
description: Verify user can create a new reservation on the calendar view if the time slot and vehicle are available.

steps.description: Open vehicle reservations calendar
Select a free date and time slot for a vehicle
Enter reservation details and submit
Verify the reservation is added on the calendar correctly

title: Prevent vehicle reservation conflict on calendar
description: Ensure the system blocks reservation creation if the vehicle is already booked for the specified time.

steps.description: Open reservations calendar
Attempt to create a reservation for a vehicle already reserved at chosen time
Verify the system displays a conflict error message and prevents saving

title: Fueling and maintenance record add and validation
description: Verify users can add fueling or maintenance events using forms that validate input fields correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to fueling and maintenance tracking section
Open 'Add Fueling' form, input valid data, and submit
Verify the fueling record is saved and displayed in the list
Open 'Add Maintenance' form, leave mandatory fields blank and attempt submission
Verify validation errors are shown and submission is blocked

title: Parking spot allocation and management
description: Test that administrators can assign and reassign parking spots to vehicles or users successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to parking spot management interface
Assign a free parking spot to a vehicle
Verify parking spot is associated with the vehicle
Change the parking spot allocation to another vehicle or user
Verify allocation updates correctly without conflicts

title: Admin dashboard statistics display and accuracy
description: Validate that the admin dashboard shows real-time, accurate, and comprehensive statistics on fleet operations.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin dashboard
Verify correct rendering of visual statistics for vehicle usage, maintenance, fueling and user activities
Confirm metrics update in near real-time after data changes

title: User management: add, edit, and remove users
description: Check that admin users can manage user accounts and roles with correct workflows and validations.

steps.description: Go to user management interface
Add a new user with valid credentials and assign a role
Verify the new user appears in the list with correct role
Edit an existing user's role
Confirm role update persists
Delete an existing user
Check the user is removed from the system

title: Responsive UI behavior on mobile devices
description: Ensure interface layouts, controls, and inputs adapt correctly and remain usable on mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Access various app pages on a mobile device or emulate mobile viewport
Verify buttons and input elements have appropriate tap target sizes
Confirm input focus behavior (keyboard popup) functions as expected
Check no horizontal scrollbars appear and layouts remain usable

title: PC UI features: hover effects, context menus, autocomplete, and shortcuts
description: Validate that hover states, context menus, autocomplete inputs fully function along with keyboard shortcuts like ESC key.

steps.description: On desktop viewport, hover on interactive elements and check expected visual feedback
Test context menu triggers on right-click for relevant UI components
Focus on autocomplete input, enter partial data, and select suggestions using keyboard
Press ESC during input or modal dialogs
Verify ESC dismisses inputs, lists, or modals correctly

title: Form usability and error handling for fueling and maintenance logs
description: Check forms have logical default focus, show clear error messages, and allow smooth multi-step input flows.

steps.description: Open fueling and maintenance entry forms
Verify initial input focus is set to the first logical field
Enter invalid or incomplete data and attempt submission
Check that descriptive error messages appear next to relevant fields
Correct errors and submit successfully
Confirm data is saved and visible

title: React SSR hydration integrity check
description: Ensure there are no mismatches during React SSR hydration, especially in UI elements involving random values or dynamic dates.

steps.description: Load the application server-side rendered pages
Verify no React hydration warnings or errors appear in console
Check UI components render identically on first load and after hydration

title: Accessibility checks for keyboard navigation and shortcuts
description: Validate accessibility features including keyboard navigation, focus states, and shortcuts like ESC key dismiss.

steps.description: Navigate through app interfaces using keyboard only
Verify that all focusable elements have visible focus states
Trigger modals or lists and use ESC key to dismiss them
Confirm that ESC key works consistently across UI components

title: Usability testing on PC and Mobile devices
description: Conduct end-to-end usability workflows on both PC and various mobile devices ensuring no critical user experience blockers.

steps.description: Perform key workflows such as driving log management, reservations, and form submissions on desktop
Verify smooth interactions with no errors or layout issues
Repeat same workflows on mobile devices with different screen sizes
Confirm usability is intuitive with no tap/scroll issues or missing content
